• Overview

Publications

  • Multistage Adaptive Load Balancing for Big Active Data Publish Subscribe Systems
    H. Nguyen, M. Sarwar Uddin, N.Venkatasubramanian
    Proc. 13th ACM Int'l. Conf. on Distributed and Event-based Systems (DEBS), Darmstadt, Germany, June 2019

  • Efficient Data Ingestion and Query Processing for LSM-Based Storage Systems
    C. Luo and M. Carey
    Proc. of the VLDB Endowment, Vol. 12, No. 5, January 2019.

  • Edge Caching for Enriched Notifications Delivery in Big Active Data
    M. Uddin and N. Venkatasubramanian.
    Proc. 38th IEEE Int'l. Conf.on Distributed Computing Systems (ICDCS), Vienna, Austria, July 2018.

  • A BAD Demonstration: Towards Big Active Data.
    S. Jacobs, M. Uddin, M. Carey, V. Hristidis, V. Tsotras, N. Venkatasubramanian, Y. Wu, S. Safir, P. Kaul, X. Wang, M. Qader, Y. Li.
    Proc. VLDB Endowment 10 (12), 2017.

  • A Comparative Study of Secondary Indexing Techniques in LSM-based NoSQL Databases
    Mohiuddin Abdul Qader, Shiwen Cheng, Vagelis Hristidis.
    Proc. of ACM SIGMOD International Conference on Management of Data (SIGMOD), 2018

  • DualDB: An Efficient LSM-based Publish-Subscribe Storage System
    Mohiuddin Abdul Qader and Vagelis Hristidis
    Proc. of International Conference on Scientific and Statistical Database Management (SSDBM) 2017

  • High-throughput Publish/Subscribe on top of LSM-based Storage
    Mohiuddin Abdul Qader, Vagelis Hristidis
    Proc. of Distributed and Parallel Databases (DAPD) Journal, 2018

  • Breaking BAD: A Data Serving Vision for Big Active Data,
    M. Carey, S. Jacobs, and V. Tsotras.
    Proc. of the 10th ACM Int’l Conf. on Distributed and Event Based Systems (DEBS '16), Irvine, CA. (2016)

  • RichNote: Adaptive Selection and Delivery of Rich Media Notifications to Mobile Users,
    M. Uddin, V. Setty, Y. Zhao, R. Vitenberg, and N. Venkatasubramanian.
    Proc. IEEE Int’l. Conf. on Distributed Computing Systems(ICDCS 2016), Nara, Japan. (2016)

  • Data Ingestion in AsterixDB,
    R. Grover and M. Carey
    Proc. of the Int'l. Conf. on Extending Database Technology (2015)

  • AsterixDB: A Scalable, Open Source BDMS,
    S. Alsubaiee, Y. Altowim, H. Altwaijry, A. Behm, V. Borkar, Y. Bu, M. Carey, I. Cetindil, M. Cheelangi, K. Faraaz. E. Gabrielova, R. Grover, Z. Heilbron, Y-S. Kim, C Li, G. Li, J. Ok, N. Onose, P. Pirzadeh, V. Tsotras, R. Vernica, J. Wen, and T. Westmann
    Proc. of the VLDB Endowment. 7 (2014)

  • SmartSource: A Mobile Q&A Middleware Powered by Crowdsourcing,
    Y. Zhao, C. Liao, T. Lin, J.Yin, N. Do, C. Hsu, and N. Venkatasubramanian
    Proc. of the IEEE 16th Int'l. Conf. on Mobile Data Management (MDM) (2015)

  • LSM Based Storage and Indexing: An Old Idea with Timely Benefits,
    S. Alsubaiee, M. Carey, and C. Li
    Proc. of the 2nd Int’l. ACM SIGMOD Workshop on Managing and Mining Enriched Geo-Spatial Data. Melbourne, Florida.(2015)

  • Scalable Fault-Tolerant Elastic Data Ingestion in AsterixDB,
    R.Grover
    Ph.D. Thesis, CS Department, UC Irvine (2015)

  • Spatial Indexing in the Era of Social Media,
    S. Alsubaiee
    Ph.D. Thesis, CS Department, UC Irvine (2014)
